app.name: Forwarder for Slippi Nintendont
app.long_description:
Commiters: Fizzi, Nikki, meta
Project website: https://github.com/project-slippi/Nintendont
Allows you to forward to Slippi Nintendont from priiloader so that you don't need to reconfigure it if you update Nintendont Install "Forwarder for Slippi Nintendont" in priiloader and then set priiloader to autoboot to the installed file
